product_name: Klean Kanteen Classic Water Bottle with Loop Cap - 40 fl. oz. - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Great for camping or car trips, the durable, high-volume 40 fl. oz. Klean Kanteen Classic water bottle with loop cap holds cold beverages inside safe, taste-free stainless steel. Bottle is made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free and unlined. Painted exterior is an acrylic, resin-based finish that is totally free of lead and other toxins (hand washing is recommended for painted bottles). Bottle mouth measures 1.75 in. and is easy to drink from directly and sized to accept ice cubes; polypropylene screw cap is easy to grip and seals tight to prevent leaks. Loop top lets you attach the bottle to a backpack or raft using a carabiner (not included). Please note: This Klean Kanteen bottle is single walled and is not intended for use with hot liquids. Closeout.
